about_the_game:
Crash onto a mysterious moon and dive into the eerie depths of Droian, a sci-fi horror Metroidvania where exploration is key, and danger lurks around every corner.

Crash onto a mysterious moon in Droian, a sci-fi horror Metroidvania where exploration and survival go hand in hand. As I.A.N, the last active bot, you’ll uncover unsettling secrets, face mechanical nightmares, and hunt for the vital Xenomorphite mineral to save humanity.

With eerie pixel art inspired by Gameboy classics, cryptic lore, and multiple endings that challenge your choices, Droian offers a thrilling adventure filled with discovery and danger at every turn.

  • Traverse the desolate yet eerie DMI moon, filled with secrets hidden in every corner.

  • Uncover the mysteries of Xenomorphite and help I.A.N complete his mission.

  • Non-linear exploration — collect items and unlock areas in your own order.

  • "Always check your crevices" - Subtle Narrative with Extensive Lore

  • Face terrifying bosses and enemies that blend flesh and machine in gruesome ways.

  • Engage in strategic combat against creatures that challenge both skill and wit.

  • Scary and atmospheric, but challenging rather than punishing.

  • Three spine-tingling bosses and many monstrous encounters

  • Sci-fi and Metroidvania fans will enjoy the balance of exploration and combat.

  • Subtle storytelling with a lot of hidden lore for conspiracy lovers.

  • Discover the cryptic history of X-corps, the DMI moon, and its connection to humanity’s survival.

  • Multiple endings that make you question your choices — who is the man at the door? Did I really save Humanity?

  • Perfect for conspiracy theorists who love piecing together subtle story clues.

content_descriptors.notes:
Droian contains scenes and elements that may not be suitable for younger audiences. The game features enemies and bosses with disturbing, gore-like transformations that blend flesh and machinery, creating unsettling and intense visual experiences. These designs, despite being pixel art and not fully explicit include contorted bodies, disembodied heads, exposed eyes, and other body parts fused with mechanical elements.

Players should be aware that Droian is a sci-fi horror game designed to provoke tension and fear through its mix of mechanical and biological horrors, but it does not contain explicit adult themes outside of its horror elements.

short_description: Unravel the eerie secrets of Droian, a sci-fi horror metroidvania. Guide a lone I.A.N bot through a desolate moon to save humanity, battling twisted creatures of flesh and machine. Explore dark, labyrinthine environments and uncover cryptic mysteries, where every path holds a chilling surprise.
